title: Interfacial engineering with trivalent cations for efficient and stable inverted inorganic perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7271-7280
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02486A, Paper
Zezhang Wang, Tianfei Xu, Nan Li, Yali Liu, Kun Li, Zihao Fan, Jieke Tan, Dehong Chen, Shengzhong Liu, Wanchun Xiang
p–i–n inorganic PSCs with ytterbium cation surface treatment achieve an efficiency of 21.4% with enhanced stability, benefiting from improved interfacial band energy alignment, reduced surface defects and iodide migration.
